channel.title: Stonetop: A Darkening Sky (5 sessions, May 1 - 29, Weds 19:00 CDT/GMT-5)
channel.description:
![image|500x500](upload://xyva7slZAhDESR0bjZese4X54Ag.png)
Each session is scheduled for 3.5 hours. Session will be recorded, but only shared publicly with consent of all participants.
This will be a 5-session series. Attendance at the Session 1 is mandatory; attendance at all subsequent sessions is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
Stonetop is my hearth-fantasy hack of Dungeon World. You'll play the local heroes (or at least, notables) of an isolated village in an iron age that never was. Session 1 will be setup: orientation, character creation, and collaboratively establishing details about the village. Subsequent sessions will build directly from these details. [Learn more about Stonetop here](https://spoutinglore.blogspot.com/2018/07/stonetop.html).
This game will be run in accordance with the Gauntlet inclusivity policy. We will have a tone and content discussion before the game begins, including setting out lines and veils. The X-Card will be in use while we play.
Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbfUY5J7KWgQoVj1fju Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbfUoxa2hjjqTlvX78C Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbfUyIvDIKrghLLByxH Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbfV5JHLQWXkJvAdfwf Session 5: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbfVFesW-DgTYyo62rQ
